cause.description:
The Save Darfur's mission is to raise public awareness about the ongoing genocide in Darfur and to mobilize a unified response to the atrocities that threaten the lives of two million people in the Darfur region.
1. Genocide must end immediately
2. Educate to end ignorance
cause.mission: To end the genocide in Darfur, Sudan
cause.name: Instant Karma
